name: Pirate Froggy
description:
Rumors are of a shooting star that fell into the sea. I need to find it! It's out there somewhere. Last night I enjoyed some rum and shanties and woke up on this isle. How do I get out of here?

play as a froggy pirate trying to find a shooting star, battle a captain, and listen to what others frogs have to say! You can also sail your own lilypad!!

Music by Payton Petkus (Jaded)

controls:

  • wasd to move
  • e to talk
  • r to advance dialogue
  • q or left mouse button to attack
